summary: A ramshackle mansion in the woods: individuals of all type, age and condition eat, roam or rest inside. But always in strict silence.
cast: Francisco Nascimento|Valeria Bruni Tedeschi|Alex Descas|Leos Carax|Oksana Chernych|Viktorija Nareiko|Eugenija Sulgaite|Leonardas Zelcius|Egle Kuckaite|Greta Sapkaite|Evinij Jankelevic|Aloyzas Mongirdas|Atanas Cereska|Marija Olsauskaite|Ingrida Kucinskaite|Ziville Adomaiyte|Tomas Vaisieta|Jurgita Giniuniene|Ignas Vytautas Obolenas|Antanas Pieviskis|Diana Bachtiejeva|Micaela Cardoso|Genadij Lialikov|Grazina Kernagiene|Valentina Kavtaradze|Agne-Egle Gregorauskaite|Aurelija Dainyte|Giedre Ramanauskaite|Egle Piliciauskaite|Daiva Stubraite|Ceslov Luckovskij|Jurate Vilunaite|Michailas Sukerzys|Jean-Louis Loca|Vytauntas Kikutis|Arunas Dubinskas|Juozapas Asmenskas|Renata Kasiulyte|Mecislov Tocickij|Sigita Augustinaite|Darius Jarasiunas|Petras Olsaukas|Moisa Jankelevic|Gene Cernis|Lina Bieksaite|Halina Taraskevic|Antonliy Roev|Natalija Makarenko|Jonas Cepaitis|Ausra Gordeckaite|Vida Nastareviciute|Stasys Belikas|Dovydas Bursteinas|Saida Ingilertaite|Evelina Baltrusaityte|Limja Ingilertaite|Vytas Piskinas|Milda Stoskute|Greta Krobackyte|Loreta Vinciunaite|Martynas Peteris|Marius Danys|Vita Lapenaite|Adomas Danys|Jargis Sardakovas|Gediminas Akstinas|Rokas Kulys|Laima Akstinaite|Julius Kaikaris|Marija Kvietkauskyte|Ieva Kaikaryte
title: La casa
